front.title: GSS-API Domain-Based Service Names and Name Type

abstract.t: This document describes domainname-based service principal names and the corresponding name type for the GSS-API. Domain-based service names are similar to host-based service names, but using a domain name (not necessarily and Internat domain name) instead of or in addition to a hostname. The primary purpose of domain-based service names is to provide a way to name clustered services after the domain which they service, thereby allowing their clients to authorize the service's servers based on authentication of their names.
